item.title: Trump tariff fallout: Navarro downplays sell-off, while Musk slams his qualifications; tech and finance chiefs reportedly head to Mar-a-Lago
item.description: This was CNBC’s live coverage of how U.S. trade partners, industries and employers responded to President Donald Trump’s historic tariffs.

item.title: Protesters tee off against Trump and Musk in “Hands Off!” rallies across the U.S.
item.description: Over 1,200 "Hands Off!" demonstrations were planned by 150 groups, including civil rights organizations, labor unions, LBGTQ+ advocates and elections ...

item.title: U.S. starts collecting Trump's new 10% tariff, smashing global trade norms
item.description: U.S. customs agents began collecting President Donald Trump's unilateral 10% tariff on all imports from many countries on Saturday.

item.title: Economists take issue with Trump's tariff formula, arguing rate is inflated
item.description: The formula the Trump administration used to calculate his tariffs is bewildering economists.

item.title: Trump administration argues judge can't order return of man mistakenly deported to El Salvador
item.description: A federal judge didn't have the authority to order the Trump administration to broker the return of the Maryland man, government attorneys argued Satu...
